name: MyWorld
overview:
ABOUT MyWorld

MyWorldâ„¢ is a fast-paced startup. Our mission is to help shoppers save time, money and improve the quality of their lives. We are bringing advanced (proven) analytics from the business environment to the consumer market. Leveraging our proprietary database that has assortment, pricing and promotions for major retailers in every major metropolitan area, we are helping shoppers optimally plan their shopping trips and make better purchasing decisions (higher quality) while saving time and money.

MyWorld is founded by two successful entrepreneurs Ken and Tim Ouimet. In 1990s, the Ouimet brothers launched the retail price optimization industry by founding Khimetrics. They helped National retailers like Albertsonâ€™s, Loweâ€™s and 7-Eleven better align their pricing with local demand and competition. Before being acquired by SAP in 2006, Khimetrics was ranked by Inc. Magazine as one of the fastest growing private companies and by Fortune Magazine as one of their 25 breakout companies.
